thread.title: Watch Chris Shiflett's Video for "West Coast Town"
thread.title_full: Watch Chris Shiflett's Video for "West Coast Town"

author: Noisey Staff
title: Watch Chris Shiflett's Video for "West Coast Town"
text:
Watch Chris Shiflett's Video for "West Coast Town" Warning: The video from the Foo Fighters guitarist will absolutely make you want to go to the beach immediately and also buy some of those cowboy boots that are sandals 
Chris Shiflett is also known for being the guitarist for everyone's favorite band, Foo Fighters, but right now he's making some raucous modern cowpunk (a genre that is exactly what you think it is). The Santa Barbara, California native's third solo album was produced by Dave Cobb (who has produced records for Shooter Jennings, Sturgill Simpson, and Jason Isbell), and it immediately puts you in the mood for a good-ass time. 
Today we're premiering Shiflett's video for "West Coast Town," featuring several famous Santa Barbara haunts (including one of my favorites, Jedlicka's Saddlery) and a reminder that even cozy California beach towns have hillbilly hearts Surf's up, partners.
